verses.verse: He who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in the <S%H5643>shelter<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> Will <S%H3885>abide<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
I will <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "My <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress,<s%> My <S%H430>God,<s%> in whom I <S%H982>trust!<s%>"
For it is He who <S%H5337>delivers<s%> you from the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of the <S%H3353>trapper,<s%> And from the <S%H1942>deadly<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

He will <S%H5526>cover<s%> you with His <S%H84>pinions,<s%> And <S%H8478>under<s%> His <S%H3671>wings<s%> you may <S%H2620>seek<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> His <S%H571>faithfulness<s%> is a <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H5507>bulwark.<s%>
You will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H6343>terror<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> Or of the <S%H2671>arrow<s%> that <S%H5774>flies<s%> by <S%H3119>day;<s%>
Of the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> that <S%H1980>stalks<s%> in <S%H652>darkness,<s%> Or of the <S%H6986>destruction<s%> that <S%H7703>lays<s%> <S%H7703>waste<s%> at <S%H6672>noon.<s%>

A <S%H505>thousand<s%> may <S%H5307>fall<s%> at your <S%H6654>side,<s%> And <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousand<s%> at your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand;<s%> [But] it shall not <S%H5066>approach<s%> you.
You will <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> on with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> And <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8011>recompense<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For you have <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> [Even] the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High,<s%> your <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> <S%H4583>place.<s%>
For He will <S%H6680>give<s%> His <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H6680>charge<s%> concerning you, To <S%H8104>guard<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
They will <S%H5375>bear<s%> you up in their <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H5062>strike<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> against a <S%H68>stone.<s%>
You will <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon the <S%H7826>lion<s%> and <S%H6620>cobra,<s%> The <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> and the <S%H8577>serpent<s%> you will <S%H7429>trample<s%> <S%H7429>down.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Because<s%> he has <S%H2836>loved<s%> Me, therefore I will <S%H6403>deliver<s%> him; I will <S%H7682>set<s%> him [securely] on <S%H7682>high,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H3045>known<s%> My <S%H8034>name.<s%>
"He will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Me, and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him; I will be with him in <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> I will <S%H2502>rescue<s%> him, and <S%H3513>honor<s%> him.
"With a <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%> I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> him, And let him <S%H7200>behold<s%> My <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>"
